16 SEPT 2019

work

today i got a PR in to start a new “branding” feature we’re building. i then started researching an issue we’re having with loadable-components. i didn’t much work done, mostly research, documentation reading, and issue reading on github.

non-work

today was elias’ birthday! the majority of my evening was spent at port fonda with elias, his mom, and his sister. we ended the night watching some netflix.
